Description
Application
The type Application.
Application_B3
Class with Customer objects and main() function.
Application_B3Tests
Class derived from Application_B3 to test the Customer implementation.
Application_B4Tests
Class to test remaining classes of the datamodel package: Article, Order, OrderItem and Customer.

Class with Customer and Order objects.
Application_C3_jsondata
Class to read Customer and Order objects from JSON.

Class with main() function.
Article
Class for entity type Article.
Calculator
Public interface of calculator that contains method to calculate total prices and VAT on Orders
Currency
Type to enumerate currencies.
Customer
Class for entity type Customer.
DataRepository
Public interface of data repositories that store objects (entities) of data model classes.
DataRepository.ArticleRepository
Public interface of the Article repository.
DataRepository.CustomerRepository
Public interface of the Customer repository.
DataRepository.OrderRepository
Public interface of the Order repository.
Formatter
Public interface of a Formatter component that provides methods and interfaces to format objects to text in an internal StringBuffer.
Formatter.OrderTableFormatter
Interface of a formatter for Order table output.
Formatter.TableFormatter
Interface of a formatter instance for table output.
InstanceAccessor
Only public class in this package to provide access to the singleton instance of the Runtime Environment (RTE) that implements the public RTE interface.
Order
Class for entity type Order.
OrderBuilder
Singleton component that builds orders and stores them in the OrderRepository.
OrderItem
Class that describes an ordered item as part of an Order.
Play_C2_Streams
 
Printer
 
RTE
The Run-Time Environment (RTE) allows to configure and launch Runtime instances that offer public interfaces for all system components through their public interfaces.
RTE.Configuration
Interface to configure a Runtime instance before launch.
RTE.Runtime
A Runtime instance represents a running instance of the system.
TAX
Type to enumerate tax rates applicable for articles.
